I would not mind trying to set this up.
I will have to find a host that we can use.
I will prob use something similiar to webdav if that
is ok with all of you.

Let me know.  And I will let you know how things go
with finding a suitable host.  If anyone has any
suggestions or can offer a host please let me know.
Thanks
Rog

--- Kenneth Stanley <kstanley@...> wrote:
> --- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Colin Green
> <cgreen@d...> wrote:
> 
> > Anyway your quest for an environment brings me
> back to one of my 
> > original points which is - wouldnlt it be nice to
> have a central 
> > repository of environment code. Prefereably
> modified to expose a 
> > standard interface (or one of a set of interfaces)
> that we define for 
> > use in EANN/GA type projects.
> > 
> 
> I agree that having a central repository is a really
> good idea for
> neuroevolution.  Does anyone want to run such a
> repository?  I could
> point the neuroevolution.com domain to it.  I guess
> it would be some
> kind of web page that can accept uploads.
> 
> Our Files section on this group is turning into a
> kind of repository,
> but it would be nice to have one generally available
> to the public,
> inclding people not interested in NEAT.
> 
> ken
> 
>
